title: Boston brown bread
ingredients: ['225 g (8 oz) self-raising wholemeal flour', '225 g (8 oz) rye flour', '225 g (8 oz) cornmeal or polenta', '2 tsp salt', '2 tsp bicarbonate of soda', '200 g (7 oz) raisins', '150 ml (5 fl oz) blackstrap molasses', '600 ml (1 pint) buttermilk', '4 tbsp semi-skimmed milk']
